body:
## Summary

Implements all requested changes for the player model:

1. **Link player model rotation to weapon rotation** - The PlayerModel now rotates to face the aim direction (mouse cursor), so the player character visually faces where they're aiming
2. **Add weapon holding pose** - Sprites are repositioned to create a natural weapon-holding stance when the model rotates
3. **Update colors and style based on reference** - New tactical appearance with:
   - Dark gray tactical gear/vest
   - Visible skin tone on face/hands
   - Helmet-like head design
4. **Increase model scale** - Player model is now 1.3x larger to better match the assault rifle scale

## Changes

- **New sprites**: Updated all player sprites (`player_body.png`, `player_head.png`, `player_left_arm.png`, `player_right_arm.png`) with tactical gear colors matching the reference
- **GDScript**: Added `_update_aim_rotation()` function in `player.gd` to rotate PlayerModel toward mouse cursor
- **C#**: Added `UpdateAimRotation()` method in `Player.cs` for the same functionality
- **Scene files**: Updated both `Player.tscn` files with:
  - Scale of 1.3x on PlayerModel
  - Adjusted sprite positions for weapon-holding pose
  - Updated WeaponMount position

## Reference Image
The sprites are styled after the reference provided in the issue:

![Reference](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a93579dd-a3c3-4a35-83ba-2405f75d6689)

## Test Plan

- [ ] Launch the game and verify the player model has the new tactical appearance
- [ ] Verify the player model rotates to face the mouse cursor as you aim
- [ ] Confirm the model scale looks appropriate relative to the assault rifle
- [ ] Test both GDScript and C# player scenes

Fixes #190
